data.message: I need to report a page that is being managed by an unauthorized individual.  Can someone IM me?

replies.message: Hi Michael. To report a Page, please follow these steps: http://bit.ly/2bBxHYv. -Brad
I don't want to take the page down.  The person who has control should no longer have control...
Hi Michael. To remove someone who has a role on a Page, you'll need to be an admin of that Page. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2bVYegk. -Jessica

one last time.  A member of our organization set up a page.  That person has left the organization and won't hand the page off.  We are now unable to communicate with our community.  I can provide documentation and a current list of executive board members.  Please help.
